section:
Class List Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:Library.Mapping.AbstractLayer< T >
Generic Abstract Layer. Takes a type of T which defines what variable type tiles is Library.Mapping.AbstractMap< T >
Generic Abstract Layer. Takes a type of T which defines what variable type layers is Application.App
App extends on the monogame class Game to setup and run the game Library.Util.Box
Define a box Library.Graphics.GraphicsComponent
Generic graphics component abstract class Library.Graphics.IGraphicsComponent
Generic graphics component interface Library.Mapping.MappingPos
MappingPos defines a position on the map Content_Library.Reader.MapReader
Read the binary map file Content_Library.Writer.MapWriter
A public class that writes the map that has been imported through the pipeline and write it into binary ProgramLibrary.Graphics.Renderer
Defines whats being rendered and draws it in the screen Library.Serializers.SerialColor
Serializable Color Library.Serializers.SerialLayer
Serializable Layer Library.Serializers.SerialMap
Serializable map Library.Serializers.SerialTileset
Serializable Tileset Library.Graphics.Sprite
Sprite class defines a sprites texure and hitbox Library.Graphics.Tile
A graphics component that represents a map tile Library.Mapping.TileLayer
A tilelayer used to define what tiles are visible at this depth. Tile type is a list of Tile. Extends AbstractLayer and implements comparable and graphics component. Library.Mapping.TileMap
A tilemap used to define what layers are in the map. Layer type is a TileLayer. Implements IGraphicsComponent.
